enable-friend-points.label: Enable Friend Points
enable-friend-points.description: Enable / disable the Friend Points feature.

enable-debug-logs.label: Enable Debug Logs
enable-debug-logs.description: Enable / disable debug logs that can be viewed from the developer console (F12).

log-messages.actor-not-found: Sheet data does not contain actor.
log-messages.user-not-owner: User is not the owner of the actor.
log-messages.actor-not-character: Actor {actorName} associated with sheet is not a character.
log-messages.resource-not-found: Friend Points resource not found in character data for actor {actorName}.
log-messages.app-minimized: App is minimized. Skipping adding Friend Points UI elements.
log-messages.resource-already-exists: Actor {actorName} already has Friend Points resource. Skipping addition.
log-messages.resource-update-failed: Failed to update Friend Points resource for actor {actorName}: {errorMessage}.
log-messages.resource-updated: Friend Points for actor {actorName} updated. New value: {newValue}.
